Name: COMMODITIES
EIF: provisionally on 1 April 1985, in accordance with article 37(2). The Agreement was extended until 31 March 1992 [by Decsion 3 (VI) confirmed by the International Tropical Timber Council at its session held in Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire on 24 May 1989] , and further until 31 March 1994 [by Decision 4 (X) taken at its session held in Quito, Ecuador from 29 May to 6 June 1991], respectively, and was terminated in accordance with its provisions on 31 March 1994.
